1:
I give praise to Yahweh with all my life,
\q and with all that is within me, I give praise to his holy name.
\q
2:
I give praise to Yahweh with all my life,
\q and I remember all of his good deeds.
5:
He satisfies your life with good things
\q so that your youth is renewed like the eagle.
6:
Yahweh does what is fair
\q and does acts of justice for all who are oppressed.
\q
7:
He made known his ways to Moses,
\q his deeds to the descendants of Israel.
\q
8:
Yahweh is merciful and gracious;
\q he is patient; he has great covenant loyalty.
10:
He does not deal with us as our sins deserve
\q or repay us for what our sins demand.
11:
For as the skies are high above the earth,
\q so great is his covenant faithfulness toward those who honor him.
\q
12:
As far as the east is from the west,
\q this is how far he has removed the guilt of our sins from us.
\q
13:
As a father has compassion on his children,
\q so Yahweh has compassion on those who honor him.
16:
The wind blows over it, and it disappears,
\q and no one can even tell where it once grew.
17:
But the covenant faithfulness of Yahweh is from everlasting to everlasting on those who honor him.
\q His righteousness extends to their descendants.
\q
18:
They keep his covenant
\q and remember to obey his instructions.
\q
19:
Yahweh has established his throne in the heavens,
\q and his kingdom rules over everyone.
20:
Give praise to Yahweh, you his angels,
\q you mighty ones who are strong and do his word,
\q and obey the sound of his word.
\q
21:
Give praise to Yahweh, all his angel armies,
\q you are his servants who carry out his will.
\q
22:
Give praise to Yahweh, all his creatures,
\q in all the places where he reigns.
\q I will give praise to Yahweh with all my life.
